      Returns:

    • addEquipmentToActivity

      public boolean addEquipmentToActivity​(int id, java.lang.String equipment)
      Adds the given equipment to the activity with the given id. If an activity with the given id exists, then the given equipment is added to it and true is returned. False is returned otherwise.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the activity to add the equipment to
      equipment - the equipment to add to the activity
      Returns:
      true if the equipment was added to the activity, false if otherwise
